p: Cinnamomumverum essential oil, cinnamaldehyde, eugenol, and linalool (reference standards), (Sigma-Aldrich, Saint Lois, MO, USA) were tested in the concentration range from 256 to 2 Âµg/mL. Serial twofold dilutions were prepared in dimethyl sulphoxide (DMSO; Sigma-Aldrich) using 7H9-Smedium as dilution. The final DMSO concentration did not exceed 1% ( v/ v) and had no influence on growth of the tested strain.
